Ok, unfortunately the internal list that stands is as follows as these members followed my instructions and mailed me their pictures and details. For those of you who just entered your names to the list without following the requested procedures, may I suggest you still attend as I'm sure we can find you a spot in the external display, however this will not include a free pass. Sorry.

1.Graham Dean
2. Brent Burkin
3. Claude Buisan
4. Rob Weyman
5. Gez Ensine
6. Andy Pullen
7. Jason Bond
8. Barry Richards
9. Kate Mew
10. Simon Spencer
11. Garry collins
12. Steve Bridges
13. Phil Davies
14. Billy Willis
15. Mark ? KBY 302C

Damon 22
SJTW
George 21
Buzz
Mav

Cheers all

Rikki

Ha! Serves me right for jumping the gun and not reading to the end
See you outside!

Thanks Rikki,
See you at Sandown Park.

Billy (no.14)
Buggar.... My reading let me down again!!!!!
Thanks Rikki

Please can the people on the reserve list below get you registration numbers to me ASAP (presuming your buses are "shiny"), as I have now been informed that not everyone listed on the internal display can do both days!?!?!?

1. Damon 22
2 .SJTW (Steve Williams)
3. George 21
4. Buzz
5. Mav

Cheers.

Hi Rikki,

Knowing Marc in number 15 he will want to be in the outside not the inside line up. I'll get him to confirm. He is trash116 on here so sure he posted on the last page saying outside.

Hi Rikki

I added myself to the outside list my bus isn't shiny..

My reg is KBY302C

I'll email you so there is no confusion.
Fab. Thanks for confirmation Rikki. See you there on the Sunday. Kate (number 9) x
